channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Workspace Control
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Workspace Control

item.title: CVE-2024-44104|2024-09-10T20:41:33.032Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: An incorrectly implemented authentication scheme that is subjected to a spoofing attack in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-44105|2024-09-10T20:43:26.618Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to obtain OS credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-8012|2024-09-10T20:37:19.762Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: An authentication bypass weakness in the message broker service of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-44107|2024-09-10T20:47:26.779Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: DLL hijacking in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges and achieve arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-44103|2024-09-10T20:39:40.204Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: DLL hijacking in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-44106|2024-09-10T20:45:28.624Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: Insufficient server-side controls in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.
